post:
KMS-Hosting provides reliable VPS solutions in it's own colocation suites in Frankfurt (Germany) since 2012. We're running our own multihomed network and enterprise HP Servers.

All our Linux VPS include ddos mitigation for attacks up to 60Gbit/s. Currently, we have around 3.000 clients - join them and get satisfied :) - Our offers are prepaid based, so you can stop paying at any time.

Just have a look on our vps packages: 

> [https://www.kms-hosting.com/en/linux-vserver/](https://www.kms-hosting.com/en/linux-vserver/)

Up to 4 Cores / 8GB Ram / 500GB Raid10 Storage / 2TB Traffic

If you have further questions, you can reach us by Skype (kms.support) or eMail (support@kms-hosting.com), we're happy to answer your questions ;)
